entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suboptimal codegen for Vector3 -> Vector128 conversion` #92671
    Future
  • Relax DynamicMethod to permit ref returns #92670
  • [QUIC] Authentication failed because the remote party sent a TLS alert 'UserCanceled' #92669
  • [Mono] Accessing the thread state of a resurrected Thread object asserts #92663
    9.0.0
  • Interop source generators failing build in dotnet/runtime when latest SDK is installed #92655
  • [API Proposal]: GC.RegisterNonGCSegment (custom NonGC heaps) #92650
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed #92649
  • [Test Failure] Http2_IncorrectServerPreface_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException #92647
  • [API Proposal]: Deprecate non-generic collections #92640
  • Configuration-binding source generator: section children values aren't overridden by configuration #92638
  • `UnsafeAccessor` throws `MissingFieldException` on generic field (`T`) #92633
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonElement.TryGetDouble() succeeds when the value is not representable as a double #92631
  • dotnet publish with reference to `Microsoft.Data.SqlClient` 5.1.1 causes NETSDK1152 for Microsoft.Web. WebView2.Core.dll #92676
  • [Feature Request]: Add synchronous gauge instrument #92625
    9.0.0
  • WhenDiskIsFullTheErrorMessageContainsAllDetails fails for large disks #92624
  • CreateCertificate_MicrosoftPlatformCryptoProvider_EcdsaKey fails with The requested operation is not supported #92623
  • MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_Loopback_Succeeds doesn't #92622
  • Using null conditional in if statement comparisons has bad performance #92620
  • .NET SDK 7.0.401 and msquic 2.2.0 break HTTP/3 on Linux #92617
  • Deoptimization returns different versions of code when R2R is used #92616
    8.0.0

Closed

  • 📢dotnet/runtime schedule for the remainder of .NET 7 #72297
    Future
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to System.Diagnostics.Metrics's Meter and Instruments #87758
    Future
  • Write barrier elision on object reference assignment to a return buffer? #92662
  • Property on custom attribute not returned when attribute uses inheritance [.NET Framework] #92565
    Future
  • Unable to run tests in libraries #92652
  • Configuration provider does not deserialize Dictionary<int, T> correctly. #92609
    Future
  • `NullabilityInfoContext` reporting incorrect nullability for `ParameterInfo` of generic types #92487
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209/Runtime_91209.cmd #92572
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Multiply/MultiplyLongOps/MultiplyLongOps.cmd #92571
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of `object` scheme #76062
    9.0.0
  • Compiler overwrites wrong memory location in .NET 8 RC1 when using Unsafe.Add and Vector256<uint>[0] #92590
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 7/23/2023 6:20:38 PM #91361
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ReadAllLinesEnumerable method #92636
  • System.Text.Json can't deserialize nested records inside class #92629
  • [API Proposal]: Use [RuntimeDirectivesAttribute] to mark RuntimeDirectives Types when use reflection in aot. #92593

PullRequests

Created

  • Define bool as Interop.BOOL to prevent upper bytes setting native bool #92679
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix arm64 fragment unwinding #92678
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert SpinWait to QCall #92675
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move more sprintf usages to snprintf #92674
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable SIMD intrinsics on winx64. #92673
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update TensorPrimitives.CosineSimilarity to vectorize handling of remaining elements #92672
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove all PGO assets except for the runtime PGO archive. #92668
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] GetChromeVersions: Fix fetching v8 version given a chrome version #92667
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make it possible to preinitialize HW intrinsic IsSupported #92666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #92665
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change how test assemblies opt-in to LibraryImportGenerator usage #92661
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Enable all interop generators if any are enabled #92660
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, dev-innerloop
  • [llvm] Fix spilling of valuetypes to the stack if they are passed by … #92658
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add tests for `UnsafeAccessor` on fields on generic types #92657
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle () for llvm on x64. #92656
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Binder gen incremental final #92654
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: Handle remainder accesses more precisely in physical promotion liveness #92651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use P256 for PCP X.509 test #92646
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: [mono][tests] Enable trimming for libraries and functional tests on CI #92645
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92627
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update the Windows ARM64 unwinder #92604
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add net8 wasi workload tests #92653
    area-Workloads, os-wasi
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Meter and Instruments #91496
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • fixed the order of WASI_AFTER_RUNTIME_LOADED_CALLS #92552
    community-contribution, os-wasi, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove CallArgABIInformation::IsStruct #92635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JitDump improvements and other minor cleanup #92510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add link to a known issue on Android-Bionic #92632
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Minor code cleanup in TensorPrimitives tests #92575
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Fix containment of extract intrinsics as STOREIND sources #92634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test exclusion for Runtime_91209 #92613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure HW intrinsics enabled when running arm64 longmul tests. #92607
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92630
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by array schema #92337
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Unaligned read/write only when NO_UNALIGNED_ACCESS is set #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasi] Fix wasi.build.test instructions #92614
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Split off patched code into separate .S file and disable subsections-via-symbols for it #92555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Convert all remaining tests in the Loader subtree to the merged model #92407
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Stop setting separate properties for BUNDLE_PROBE, HOSTPOLICY_EMBEDDED, PINVOKE_OVERRIDE #92448
    area-Host
  • [browser] WASM sidecar - multi-threading proposal #91731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add illink analyzer support for field/property initializers #92600
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Unwrap flag from UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller #92599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Doc fix-ups to InstrumentRule #92035
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo*/Extract* #92513
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] WASM deputy worker - multi-threading proposal #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by value type schema #92334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Include info about system call errors in some exceptions from operating on named mutexes #92603
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts task's Analyzer resolution breaks Roslyn analyzer dependency isolation #35739

PullRequests

Created

  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #35710
    Servicing-approved, Area-VS, 8.0.1xx
  • Update RID parsing's `LastIndexOf` call to use invariant culture #35637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add spelling exclusions file #35716
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2277178 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • branding update for 8.0.2xx #35661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AnalyzerRunner throws an Exception: Missing assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild.BuildHost' #70139
  • Roslyn shows a false error for an interceptor attribute when pathmap is used #70138
  • Strange output for NormalizeWhitespace for `1 is var i` #70135
    Backlog
  • Adding .editorconfig as a `<Compile>` item results in Roslyn exceptions that propagate through the project system #70134

Closed

  • Collection expressions: Incorrect diagnostic reported for element conversion error with CollectionBuilder type #69980
    17.8
  • IDE0251 Incorrectly suggests readonly (problem area: inline arrays converting to spans) #70116
  • WRN_GeneratorFailedDuringGeneration isn't helpful without a StackTrace #48008
    17.8
  • 'Frozen Partial' semantics need to be reconciled with OOP and SourceGEnerators #63968
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localize "Not Applicable" #70144
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fall back to using .NET Core MSBuild if no VS is installed #70143
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.8] Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source #70133
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address test feedback #70130
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Set C# InteractiveWindow default to .NET Core #70127
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2277081 #70141
  • Alternate approach to checksums for @toddgrun #70140
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70142
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a struct enumerator for WeakList<T> #70075
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: verify element type when reporting conversion error to CollectionBuilder type #69981
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change completion sorting to use ArrayBuilder instead of SegmentedList #70103
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix 'make member readonly' with inline array fields #70118
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.8] Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always respond to the 'cycle through references' command #70126
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config file #70125
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.8 P3 #70124
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't recreate whole completion item upon calculation of properties. #70097
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70145
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow only ordinary member method calls to be intercepted #70120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PERF: CompletionService.MergeAndPruneCompletionLists doesn't need to always sort #70111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Initial implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Do not restrict to type argument list context when a name could resolve to a generic and a non-generic symbol #70122
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • [17.8] Handle 32bit Debug desktop in end-to-end test #70114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle constant `null`s in pointer pattern matching #70113
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged
  • Port accessibility fix for the text view control in lightbulb preview #70112
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 blazor web with RenderModeServer Issues with CascadingAuthenticationState #50951
  • source-building: restore.cmd not working properly (Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk not found) #50950
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #50948
  • Blazor Server authentication documentation is all over the place #50947
  • Enhanced form submit to a different internal URL doesn't update browser location #50945
    8.0
  • The client has disconnected Inner Exception - System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException 0x80070040 The specified network name is no longer available #50944
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 7.0.11 requires >= 7.0.0 of Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect #50943
  • Output cache: serve cached response if request fails #50942
  • how to implement external login provders(linkedin) login using .net core with openidconnect? #50941
  • ThrowTargetParameterCountException raised when running my .NET WebAPI #50940
  • Blazor javascript isolation in different assembly #50939
  • SignalR C++ client #50938
  • Improve UX for creating a Blazor Web App when selecting None for the interactivity type #50932
  • Hot reload doesn't work with the empty Blazor Web App template #50931
    8.0

Closed

  • Perf improvement: single_query #50934
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50935
  • AspNetCore.App runtime 6.0.21 uninstalls version 6.0.20 #50827
  • Blazor forms with @formname set from Razor expressions cannot be submitted #50882
  • octet-streams in Blazor Server via long-polling are not compressed #50895
  • SVG mouse events not working on Visual Studio 17.8.0 Preview 2.0 (.NET 8) #50896
  • Add empty option for the Blazor Web App template #48913
    .NET 9 Planning
  • New Blazor Web App fails to compile: Auto, Global, Empty #50930
    8.0-rc2
  • Dictionary model binding behaves different with Enum as Key vs Value #50748
    9.0-preview1
  • Css Isolation is broken in Blazor + Client #50937
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50922
  • Option to use HeadOutlet (or any outlet) more than once ? #50933

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50952
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23476.6 #50949
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Antiforgery fix #50946
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50919
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d1467f5` to `80306a7` #50876
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update IAcceptsMetadata docs to reflect behavior of matcher policy #50747
    Docs, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50845
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Capture parsing errors in model state when binding convertible keys #50929
    area-mvc, feature-model-binding, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.4 #50594
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    area-blazor
  • Auth with global interactivity #50920
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui for ios RTL modes problem with ScrollView #17674
  • AbsoluteLayout has slightly different behavior in Maui (than in Forms) #17673
  • Tab text color doesn't update correctly when adding/removing tabs via hot reload #17668
  • Sensors - OrientationSensor, Accelerometer - result NAN #17666
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView ItemsViewScrolledEventArgs are incorrect when IsGrouped = true #17664
  • Label in View contained in FlexLayout does not wrap #17658
  • Entry's SelectionLength property is not updating initially on Android, Mac and iOS platforms. #17657
  • Grid Layout Child Elements Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17654
  • [regression] Path element inside Grid is cropped in .NET 7. #17652
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Images from URLs are not rendered if you do not specify a fixed size #17651
  • problem with .NET MAUI #17650
  • MAUI Android projects generate an \obj\Debug\net6.0-android\Resource.designer.cs file containing code that ends in 12k+ CS0131 Errors #17646
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] "SwipeItem" "CommandParameter" fails to bind as null in the CollectionView #17644
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid is not aligned center in .NET 7 #17643
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0] Button Click Ripple Effect Not Working In Android #17642
    .NET 8 GA
  • Background color of every tab in tabbar of a Shell #17641

Closed

  • Dotnet/maui#17662 #17662
  • Dontnet/maui #17661
  • Xaml Compiler NullRef with Grid.Resources #10583
    Under Consideration
  • Shell.FlyoutContent does not update with hot reload (most likely an SDK issue) #9080
    Under Consideration
  • Border background is wrong by default on Android and text cannot be seen (it's correct on Windows) #16547
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border default background is black #17547
    .NET 8 GA
  • PopupPage: Screen goes black outside frame on iOS #15230
  • Add AddWebAllowedObject extension method for Webview2 #17653
  • Triggers doesn't work on appearing #17355
  • Will `PointerPressed` be supported as a visual state in .NET 8? #17632
  • MAUIG1001 An error occured while parsing Xaml: Unexpected XML declaration. Can't build the project. #17638
  • CollectionView crashes/behaves weird when ObservableCollection updated quickly #7237
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • RadioButton GroupName and IsChecked properties work inconsistently on Windows #7595
  • Incorrect Labels Margin in Grid when the Margin is Small #17408
  • AndroidNativeLibrary not getting picked in `Release` mode. #17497

PullRequests

Created

  • Log test start/stop times #17675
    area/testing
  • Can template tests run in parallel? #17672
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add better support for custom methods in query expressions #31871
  • Ignore specified query filters #31869
  • Memory leak in EntityMaterializerSource #31866
  • Adding items to child collections when parent has string PK column fails silently #31865
  • Generate migrations bundle EF core 7 in Dockerfile : ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Length cannot be less than zero #31864
  • Fail fast when using EF8 primitive collections with the Cosmos provider #31862
    8.0.0
  • HasConversion<string> from GUID generated migrations contains non existent column called TempId #31860
  • Support value converters with captured state in the compiled model #31859
  • Implement a subquery in a SqlExpression? #31858
  • Code-first migration in high-replicated states #31857
  • Intentional breaking change in v8? #31855
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Cosmos: non-shadow int key properties on owned entity types are not persisted #31854
  • Bug in EF Core 8 RC1 when optimizing models with dotnet ef dbcontext optimize .... violates the constraint of type 'TConcreteCollection'. #31835
    8.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Move sentinel to end of AddProperty #31868
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
  • [release/8.0] Fail fast when using EF8 primitive collections with the Cosmos provider #31863
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Handle more types of value converters in the compiled model #31861
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30589 - Query/Json: improve JSON entity/collection comparisons to null (fails currently for optional dependent with all nullable properties) #31856
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • Set default discriminator value even when there are no derived types. #31853
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31852
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.13
